arm_group.description: When injured by the animal who carries the rabies virus, the patient after standard treatment would survive or die

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study was to achieve the post-marketing protective effect research of
      Speeda® rabies vaccine for human use from Chengda Bio.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Protection Effect of Speeda® Rabies Vaccine for Human Use

detailed_description.textblock:
When found the injury who is bitten by the animal to three-level, the investigators would
      enroll the participant after explaining the protection and making him signed the informed
      consent. The patient would inject rabies vaccine as follow the national regulation,
      meanwhile the investigators would get the blood samples to detect whether the man-killer
      carries the rabies virus.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Parent/legal acceptable representatives of children or the adult participants are
             willing and able to understand the protocol requirements and provide informed consent
             signed

          -  Participant is considered to be in good health including the body and mental status
             on the basis of reported medical history and limited physical examination and live in
             local ≥ 12 months before injured

          -  The man-killer could found and detect whether it carries the virus

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Known bleeding disorder or suspected impairment of immunologic function, or receipt
             of immunosuppressive therapy or immunoglobulin since birth

          -  Apply passive immunity preparation

facility.name: Hunan Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

clinical_study.official_title: Phase 4 Study of Speeda® Rabies Vaccinia That Use for Protection the Crowd Bitten by Animals to Three-level

overall_official.affiliation: Beijing Chaoyang District Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

primary_outcome.description: Whether or when would the patients develop symptoms after injured by the animals carrying the virus
primary_outcome.measure: Observation of the subject after injured by the animals carrying the virus

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

clinical_study.source: Beijing Center for Disease Control and Prevention

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Prevention
